name: Ed25519
description: For use with Edwards-curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA).

name: X25519
description: Also known as Curve25519, for use with Elliptic-curve Diffieâ€“Hellman (ECDH).

name: Secp256k1
description: Made popular by Bitcoin, for use with Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

name: Bls12381
description: Made popular by Zcash and Ethereum, a pairing friendly curve supporting signature aggregation.

name: Secp256r1
description: Also known as NIST P-256, supported by WebCrypto and OAuth.

name: Secp384r1
description: Also known as NIST P-384, supported by WebCrypto and OAuth.

name: Secp521r1
description: Also known as NIST P-521, supported by WebCrypto and OAuth.
